item.title: Ticket #1456 (wp_notify_moderator includes unnecessary DB query [patch]) created
item.dc:creator: skippy
item.description:
wp_notify_moderator(), on line 243 of pluggable-functions.php: $user = $wpdb->get_row("SELECT * FROM $wpdb->users WHERE ID='$post->post_author' LIMIT 1");

The $user variable is not used in this function, and is therefore unnecessary.

item.title: Ticket #1455 (drafts of other users not visible to admin) created
item.dc:creator: amit
item.description:
hi I've a multi-user blog, where I'm a level 10 admin & there's another user with Level-1. Now when he makes any new posts, he can only save as draft or private. That New Draft is visible to me, & I publish it. Now he edits the post again & saves it but as he can't publish, its saved as draft again. Now I can't see that post in the Manage Tab. I've to go to Manage comments & then click on the "Edit Post" present with one of the comments on that post & thus I can re-publish the post. but had there not been any comment, then I'd not have been able to publish that post.

I'm using WP1.5, so had this been fixed in WP1.5.1? or hasn't it been reported at all?

item.title: Ticket #1454 (Markdown plugin gives atom validation error: summary must not contain HTML) created
item.dc:creator: alastair
item.description:
​For example

I am using the markdown plugin, and the "for each article, show summary" option.

Deactivating the markdown plugin fixes the problem.

​See also

item.title: Ticket #1452 (Trackback not working with XML-RPC) updated
item.dc:creator: ryan
item.description: Your solution works, although I fixed it a bit differently in [2653]. I passed the space separated trackback list to wp_insert_post() and wp_update_post() in the to_ping argument instead of to trackback_url_list(). insert and update know what to do with the trackbacks.

item.description: Don't stomp post_ID in mw_editPost(). Pass TB URIs to wp_update_post() and wp_insert_post() instead of directly calling trackback_url_list(). #1452
